(Simplified: 鲳)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 昌 indicates the sound; 魚 (fish) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 魚 [ yú ] fish
    • 昌 [ chāng ] sunlight; good, proper; prosperous
①(鯧魚)體側扁而高，沒有腹鰭，背部青白色，鱗細。肉味鮮美，爲名貴食用經濟魚類。亦稱“銀鯧”、“鏡魚”、“平魚”。
鯧魚 [ chāng yú ]: silvery pomfret; butterfish

鯧字的基本解释

鯧
chāng
见“鲳”。

鯧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chāng］
［《廣韻》尺良切，平陽，昌。］
“鲳1”的繁体字。
鱼纲鲳科。体短而侧扁，呈卵圆形。背部青白色，腹部银白色。头小吻圆，口小牙细。鳞小而圆，上有小黑点。成鱼腹鳍消失。生活于海洋。为名贵食用鱼类。又称银鲳、镜鱼、平鱼，古也称鲳鯸。

鯧字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　鯧； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1473第10
【廣韻】尺良切【集韻】蚩良切，?音昌。鯧鯸，魚名。【正字通】生南海，似鯿，頭上突起連背，身圓肉厚，止一脊，骨耎可食，閩人譌爲䱽魚。

Pomfret
Basic explanation of words
Pomfret
chāng
See "pomfret".
Pomfret
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chāng］
["Guang Yun" Chi Liang cut, Binh Duong, Chang. ]
Traditional characters for "鳳1".
Fish class Pomfret family. The body is short, flat on the side, and ovoid in shape. The back is bluish white and the abdomen is silvery white. The head is small and round, and the mouth is small and the teeth are thin. The scales are small and round with small black spots. The ventral fin of the adult fish disappeared. Live in the ocean. For the precious edible fish. It was also called silver pomfret, mirror fish, and flat fish. It was also called pomfret in ancient times.
Pomfret
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　鲳; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1473 No. 10
[Guang Yun] Chi Liang cut [Ji Yun] Chi Liang cut,? Yin Chang. Pomfret, fish name. [Zhengzitong] It is born in the South China Sea, resembling a bream, with a protruding head and a thick body, with only one spine, and edible bones. The Hokkien jiao is a fish.
